summary_teim: The Everly Brothers, Buddy Holly, producer Sam Phillips, and Alan Freed are inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in its inaugural ceremony. Paul Shaffer and his band perform.
summary_ssm: The Everly Brothers, Buddy Holly, producer Sam Phillips, and Alan Freed are inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in its inaugural ceremony. Paul Shaffer and his band perform.
contents_teim: [Audio of Everly Brothers' "Dream"] -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces Neil Young -- Young inducts the Everly Brothers -- Everly Brothers accept their award -- Jann Wenner introduces John Fogerty -- Fogerty inducts Buddy Holly -- Maria Elena Holly accepts the award -- Ahmet Ertegun inducts Sam Phillips -- Sam Phillips accepts his award -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces Scott Muni -- Scott Muni inducts Alan Freed.
contents_ssm: [Audio of Everly Brothers' "Dream"] -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces Neil Young -- Young inducts the Everly Brothers -- Everly Brothers accept their award -- Jann Wenner introduces John Fogerty -- Fogerty inducts Buddy Holly -- Maria Elena Holly accepts the award -- Ahmet Ertegun inducts Sam Phillips -- Sam Phillips accepts his award -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces Scott Muni -- Scott Muni inducts Alan Freed.

abstract_ssm: This is footage from the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame induction ceremony on January 23, 1986. Ahmet Ertegun introduces Everly Brothers -- Neil Young inducts Everly Brothers -- Everly Brothers acceptance speech -- Buddy Holly montage -- John Fogerty inducts Buddy Holly -- Family of Buddy Holly accepts the award on his behalf -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces Sam Phillips -- Jerry Lee Lewis inducts Sam Phillips -- Sam Phillips acceptance speech -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces Alan Freed -- Scott Muni and Norm M. Knight induct Alan Freed
